author: doss0276
content: is the amount of emitted eth somewhat constant no matter how much eth is staked?

author: doss0276
content: is it close to constant, i think i played with the tool on ultrasound money and its around 900k-1m ETH/year

author: sky.cactus
content: I'm not sure how you got that.  Issuance can range between 180k/year to 1.4M/year depending on how many stakers there are.  This is before base fee burning, so the actual issuance rate will be less than that (potentially negative).

author: doss0276
content: noted, thanks! this is what i wanted to know
